mapper.select: select ort.rn, ort.no, ort.title, ort.content, ort.hit, ort.reg_date regDate, ort.user_no, ort.name from (select rownum rn, ot.no, ot.title, ot.content, ot.hit, ot.reg_date, ot.user_no, ot.name from (select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.user_no, u.name from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by no desc) ot )ort where rn>=#{startRnum} and rn<=#{endRnum}

SELECT b.no, b.title as title, u.name as name, b.hit as hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.user_no as userNo, b.content as content FROM ( SELECT rownum as rn, b.no, b.title, b.content , b.user_no, b.reg_date , b.hit FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.no where rownum between 1 and 10 and title like '%8%' ORDER BY b.no DESC ) b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no ORDER BY b.no DESC
SELECT a.no as no ,title ,name ,hit ,reg_date as regDate ,user_no as userNo FROM board a JOIN users b ON a.user_no = b.no order by no desc

SELECT no, title, name, hit, regDate FROM ( SELECT rw, no, title, name, hit, regDate FROM ( SELECT rownum as rw, a.no as no, title, name, hit, regDate FROM ( SELECT a.no as no ,title ,name ,hit ,reg_date as regDate ,user_no as userNo FROM board a JOIN users b ON a.user_no = b.no
where title like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
ORDER BY no desc ) a ) WHERE rw BETWEEN #{boardNumStart} AND #{boardNumEnd} ) ORDER BY no desc
select a.no as no , title , content , hit , reg_date regDate , user_no as userNo , name from board a JOIN users b on a.user_no = b.no where a.no = #{boardNum}
SELECT a.no as no ,title ,name ,hit ,reg_date as regDate ,user_no as userNo FROM board a JOIN users b ON a.user_no = b.no where title like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' order by no desc
